name: crush-grip
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The foe is crushed
with great force.
The attack is more
powerful the more HP
the foe has left.
